Articles.Content:
So I had the idea of of copying a command pod, making the copy a strut module, then after decoupling the clone pod changing it from the clone to a proper CM in the SFS and changing it from debris to a vessel.

The good news: it seemingly worked. The bad: It doesn\'t give you control of the ship. Attitude and throttle input don\'t get a response.

So can anyone think of what\'s going wrong?
No idea, but I do know you could have asked this in this thread, Kerbalnaut can probably help you as he as made a capsule-as-a-strut mod already.
